entry.title: BIP22/getmemorypool
entry.summary: The email thread dated June 11, 2012, involves a discussion about BIP 22, which is deemed overly complicated by the individuals involved. They express their desire to simplify it and invite feedback on key features that will likely be used by pool customers. One individual specifically mentions Electrum servers as users of these features. The focus of the discussion is not whether getmemorypool is useful but rather if the proposed 20 optional features are necessary.
